metadata.title: CVE-2015-0218 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability inauth/shibboleth/logout.php in Moodle through 2.5.9, 2.6.x before 2.6.7,2.7.x before 2.7.4, and 2.8.x before 2.8.2 allows remote attackers tohijack the authentication of arbitrary users for requests that trigger alogout.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0218` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 3.0.3+dfsg-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.3+dfsg-0ubuntu1').
